word: If we will give ourselves for service to the Lord, He will instruct us what to do. If we will come into close relation with God, He will work with us.  Let us not become so absorbed in self and self-interests that we shall forget those who are climbing the ladder of Christian experience and who need our help. We must stand ready to use our God-given capabilities in the work of the Lord, ready to speak words in season and out of season--words that will help and bless.
